Class ManageMenuService

Object
ManageMenuService
public class ManageMenuService extends Object
The ManageMenuService class contains methods to manage the menu items in the system
Author:
Alvin Aw Yong

    • filterBranch

      private static ArrayList<MenuItem> filterBranch(Session session, Branch whichBranch)
      This method filters the menu items based on the branch
      Parameters:
      session - The current session containing the list of menu items.
      whichBranch - The branch to filter the menu items by
      Returns:
      the filtered menu items
